thread.title: Best Dressed Men at the 2017 Oscars: Jamie Dornan, Pharrell Williams & More!
thread.title_full: Best Dressed Men at the 2017 Oscars: Jamie Dornan, Pharrell Williams & More!

title: Best Dressed Men at the 2017 Oscars: Jamie Dornan, Pharrell Williams & More!
text:
Email Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP 
Now that you know who the best dressed women are , it's time to highlight the men. 
Hats off to these famous faces, who've managed to navigate the sartorial minefield (read: any awards season red carpet) with style to spare! We say that because, as a guy, it's always easy to go the route of your typical black three-piece tux. So when an actor wears something even remotely different, (like Jamie Dornan 's two-toned suit) they should be commended. 
And thus the purpose of this list was born. Photos 
From Pharrell Williams in Chanel to Andrew Garfield in Tom Ford, these are your best dressed men from the 2017 Oscars red carpet— click here for the full list . 
For the full list of best dressed women, click here . 
And if you're curious who made the worst dressed list, click here . Watch E!'s live 2017 Oscars red carpet coverage today starting at 1:30 p.m. ET/10:30 a.m. PT, and join the conversation on Oscar.com and across social with #oscars and #eredcarpet. Following The Oscars® ceremony on ABC at 7 p.m. ET/4 p.m. PT, come back to E! for our live After-Party special at 12 a.m. ET/9 p.m. PT. On Monday, Feb. 27, tune in to E! News at 7 p.m. and Fashion Police at 8 p.m. for complete Oscars coverage.
